channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics

item.title: Former Rep. Mia Love, the first Black Republican woman elected to Congress, dies

item.title: Wall Street braces for Trump’s April 2 tariff deadline—it foresees 18% EU import duties and a 43% chance of a U.S. recession
item.description: Analysts expect tariffs on the EU, a key trading partner for the U.S., to settle at around 18% as recession expectations hit more than 40%.

item.title: Former GOP Rep. Mia Love dead at 49 after battle with cancer, family says
item.description: Former U.S. Rep. Mia Love, R-Utah, died on Sunday at the age of 49 after battling brain cancer, according to her family.
